channel.title: Paul Rand on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Paul Rand on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Forget Rand Paul, Let's Talk Paul Rand
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: A horrible thing has happened to search results in recent months. If you do a Google search for Paul Rand, nearly half the results on the first page—and all of the Google News results—are about Rand Paul, a man who has little to do with graceful, iconic logo design. In fact, if you actually knew something about logo design, you might be disappointed by Rand’s campaign logo.
